title: Login to server outlook.office365.com with user name failed
creator: goofusrufus

title: i can't receive emails thru TB but yet I can send and receive on my Iphone
content:
Hi there......I have been attempting to get my TB to work on my thru my hosting web provider but have not been successful. I have used all of the incoming server and outgoing server suggestions and have not been able to receive emails with TB on my desktop. I can send and receive on my iphone but not thru TB. I have also tried manual config but no cigar. I was hoping to call TB support but I see that is not possible, only thru community support. If anyone can help me I would greatly appreciate it. I guess I will look to see if I get any responses thru my gmail acct which is pfbobbo.

Thanks so much in helping with this frustrating situation.

Bob
creator: pfbobbo

title: Account setup changes my choices when I leave it.
content: In both my desktop older installation (now updated) and my new laptop installation, when I go thru Account Settings and check off what I want, it all changes when I leave the setup. I uncheck the startup page, and when I open both versions of Bird, the startup page is there again. Same with table/card setup, and other options. Isn't there a "save" in Account settings? Thanks, Stacy
creator: smarveloustoo

title: Block gif in incoming email
content: I get emails from a certain party which includes a corporate animated gif which I estimate adds 1.6MB to each email. Can I block this gif without blocking the email.
creator: rhodelta

title: How to retrieve contacts when installing Thudnerbird on new computer.
content: I installed Thunderbird and got my Protonmail working--even my trash folder is functional after not working for the past month-- except that the contacts did not accompany the message history and files. There are instructions for importing an address book file, but I do not know what sort of file my protonmail address book is ( .cvs, .tsv, or .ldif, or .vcf., .vczrd, or .sqlite, or .mab).
creator: jodeepreston
